description: JACK MYRICK is president and founder of Management Solutions, a management training company, as well as head of Myrick Enterprises, a restaurant development group. He lives in Central Oklahoma and is blessed with a wonderful wife and three incredible daughters. Jack’s presentations and workshops are known for their Southern charm and practicality.
name: Jack Myrick
